name: 甘奈
text: いっただっきまーす☆
trans: I'll be eating this now.

name: 甜花
text:
美味しそう……
いただきます……
trans: It looks good... Tenka will also eat now...

name: 甜花
text: ……はわ
trans: ...Aah.

name: 甜花
text:
……ふわふわで……とろとろ……
こっちの味も……好き……
trans: It's soft... and syrupy... Tenka likes... this kind of taste too...

name: 甘奈
text:
うん……！　甘奈まで溶けちゃいそうだよ～
やっぱりジェラートはここが１番だね！
trans: Yeah! I feel like I'm melting myself! The gelato here sure is the best!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
この前食べたのも、美味しかったけど……
trans: Yes... The one Tenka had before was also good...

name: 甘奈
text: えへ、甜花ちゃん、ほっぺに付いちゃってるよ☆
trans: Ehe, you have some at your cheek, Tenka.

name: 甜花
text:
え？　あわわ、どこ……？
こっち……？　あれ……？
trans: Eh? Awawa... Where? Here? Hmm?

name: 甘奈
text: 動かないでね……
trans: Just stay still, okay.

name: 甘奈
text:
はい、取れた！
綺麗になったよ、甜花ちゃん☆
trans: There, I've taken care of it! You're all clean now, Tenka.

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃん、ありがと……
にへへ……
trans: Thank you, Na-chan... Nihehe...

name: 甘奈
text: どういたしまして☆
trans: Don't mention it.

name: 甜花
text: あ……なーちゃんも……
trans: Ah... You have some yourself, Na-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: ん？
trans: Hmm?

name: 甜花
text: ここ……付いてる……
trans: You had some... over here...

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、ありがと、甜花ちゃん！
美味しくてつい思いっきり食べちゃうんだよね～
trans: Ehehe, thanks, Tenka! It was so good that I ended up wolfing it down.

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe...

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃん……ありがと……
甜花、この前も……拭いてもらっちゃった……
trans: Na-chan... thank you... for cleaning Tenka... before...

name: 甘奈
text:
そうだったっけ？
この前って──あ、あの時！
trans: I did? Before── Ah, you mean that time!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
タウン誌のお仕事で……どこに行くか、考えてた……
trans: Yes... When we're on that job for the town magazine... Tenka was thinking on where to go...

name: 甘奈
text: そっか、あの時は──
trans: I see. That time──

name: 甘奈
text: ここ、もう少し近かったら良かったのにね～
trans: This one's might be better since it's a little closer.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……そしたら……今度のお仕事で……
おすすめできた……
trans: Yes... If we do that... we could suggest it... for our next work...

name: 甘奈
text:
紹介する地域から外れちゃってるもんね～
ホントに美味しいからちょっと残念かも
trans: This one's a little away from the place that we're going to introduce. It's a shame since it was really good.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
なーちゃんは、もう……どこにするか、決めた……？
trans: Yes... Na-chan... Have you already up your mind... on where to go?

name: 甘奈
text:
うーん……
色々あって決めきれないって感じかな～
trans: Well... I guess it's like having a lot of things to choose from that I can't settle on which one.

name: 甜花
text:
色々……なーちゃん、すごい……
甜花、全然思いつかない……どうすれば、いいのかな……？
trans: A lot of things... That's amazing, Na-chan... Tenka can't even think of one at all... How should we go about this?

name: 甘奈
text:
んーお散歩したり、ネット調べたり
あと、友達と話したりかな？
trans: Maybe talk a walk, search on the internet and talk with friends?

name: 甘奈
text:
あ！　リラックスするのも大事だったりするよ
良いアイディアって、そういう時に思いついたりするもん！
trans: Ah! It's important to relax too! Good ideas do pop out when releaxing!

name: 甜花
text:
リラックス……
甜花なら……お昼寝、とか……？
trans: Relax... so for Tenka... that would be like going on a siesta?

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、もしかして、甜花ちゃんだったら
お昼寝してる時に思いついちゃったりして
trans: Ehehe, in your case, maybe you'll actually come up with an idea when you're on a siesta, Tenka.

name: 甜花
text:
やって……みようかな……
でもきっと……そのまま、寝て……忘れちゃう……
trans: Maybe... Tenka do just that... But... Tenka would probably... completely forget about it in her sleep...

name: 甜花
text:
……なーちゃんは……
最近、リラックス……できてる……？
trans: Na-chan... Have you had some time... to relax lately?

name: 甜花
text:
前は、もっと……
じっくり……本とか、読んだり……
trans: Like before... when you enjoy... reading a book...

name: 甘奈
text:
そういえば、そうかなぁ……
でも、お仕事楽しいしね！
trans: Now that you mentioned it, yeah... Still, I enjoy working!

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……甜花も、楽しい……
……でも……
trans: Y-Yes... Tenka enjoys it too... but...

name: 甘奈
text:
うーん、確かに、ちょっと忙しくなっちゃったよね
本かぁ……最近、読んでないかも
trans: Yeah, it's true that we've gotten a little busy. Reading a book, huh... I haven't done so lately.

name: 甜花
text: うん……
trans: Yes...

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん、そんなに心配そうにしなくて大丈夫だよ
trans: You don't have to worry that much about me, Tenka.

name: 甘奈
text: それに、それを言うなら甜花ちゃんもじゃない？
trans: Besides, it's the same with you, right?

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんだって、甘奈と一緒に
レッスンしたりしてるから、自分の時間、減ってるよね？
trans: You were taking lessons with me, so wouldn't that mean that you now have less time for yourself?

name: 甜花
text: 頑張ると……すぐ寝ちゃうから……そうかも……
trans: Since when Tenka works hard... she falls asleep right away... so that might be true...

name: 甘奈
text:
最近、ゲームしてる姿とかあんまり見ないから
甘奈、心配だよ
trans: I haven't see you do your own thing like playing games so I'm worried about you.

name: 甜花
text:
でも、甜花……
みんなより……頑張らないと……
trans: But Tenka... has to put it more effort... than everyone else...

name: 甜花
text:
だから……
ゲームは……少し、我慢……
trans: That's why... Tenka's putting up a little... to not play games...

name: 甘奈
text: ……甜花ちゃん……！
trans: Tenka!

name: 甘奈
text:
……うん！
わかった……甘奈、応援するね！
trans: Okay! I'll do my best to support you!

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃん……ありがと
今度のお仕事も……頑張る
trans: Thank you... Na-chan... Tenka will... do her best on the next job too.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、頑張ろうね
……あ！　じゃあ、甘奈からひとつ提案！
trans: Yeah, let's both make it a sucess. I know! I have an idea!

name: 甜花
text: ……どうしたの？
trans: ...What happened?

name: 甘奈
text:
今度のお仕事でおすすめする場所の話、
お互いに内緒にするの！
trans: Regarding on the places we're bringing up for our next job, let's keep it a secret to one another!

name: 甘奈
text:
それで、それぞれの場所を知るのは
発表をする日！
trans: So, we'll only know about the places on the day we're announcing it!

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈たち、今までふたりで決めてきたことが多いから
いつもと違ったところとか出てきて楽しそうじゃない？
trans: Since we've made a lot of decisions together up until now, wouldn't it be fun if a place we don't usually go come up?

name: 甜花
text: て、甜花にできるかな……
trans: C-Can Tenka even do that...?

name: 甜花
text:
で、でも……なーちゃんに、頼ってばっかだから……
甜花……頑張って、みる……！
trans: B-But... Tenka has always been depending on you so... she... will try!

name: 甘奈
text:
じゃあ、決まりね！
えへへ、甜花ちゃんがどんなところを提案するか、楽しみ☆
trans: Then, it's settled! Ehehe, I can't wait to hear what kind of places you'll suggest, Tenka!
